name: Transit Issue
query:
SELECT
ti.name AS 'Name:Data:200',
ti.workflow_state AS 'Workflow State:Data:200',
ti.customer_name AS 'Customer Name:Data:200',
ti.customer_code AS 'Customer Code:Data:200',
ti.customer_location AS 'Customer Location:Data:200',
ti.customer_phone_number AS 'Customer Phone Number:Data:200',
ti.rsm_name AS 'RSM Name:Data:200',
ti.asm_name AS 'ASM Name:Data:200',
ti.email_address_of_requestor_from_sales_team AS 'Email Address of Requestor from Sales Team:Data:200',
ti.type_of_issue AS 'Type of Issue:Data:200',
sdt.sku_code AS 'SKU Code:Data:200',
sdt.sku_name AS 'SKU Name:Data:200',
sdt.damaged_missing_quantity AS 'Damaged /Missing Quantity:Data:200',
sdt.invoice_number AS 'Invoice Number:Data:200',
sdt.batch_details AS 'Batch Details:Data:200',
ti.manufacturing_plant AS 'Manufacturing Plant:Data:200',
ti.lr_number AS 'LR number:Data:200',
ti.issue_details AS 'Issue Details:Data:200'

FROM `tabTransit Issue` ti
Inner Join 
`tabSKU Details Transit` sdt
WHERE sdt.parent = ti.name
ORDER BY
ti.name;
